CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Need help analyzing blockchain data? Reach out to our experts.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See what developers and companies have to say about our blockchain analysis platform
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: With their powerful data analysis tools, we can easily monitor new blockchain activity and stay ahead of the curve.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Their platform provides invaluable insights into emerging blockchain trends, helping us make informed investment decisions.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The real-time analytics on new blockchain data have been game-changing for our research initiatives.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our advanced analytics engine that processes and analyzes new blockchain data as it arrives, giving you real-time insights and intelligence.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Set up custom monitoring rules and receive alerts for specific blockchain events, transactions, or conditions that are important to your business or application.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Explore and query on-chain data with our powerful data exploration tools, enabling you to uncover valuable insights and patterns hidden within the blockchain.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Gain visibility into smart contract execution with our advanced monitoring capabilities, allowing you to track contract interactions, state changes, and event emissions.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Transform complex blockchain data into intuitive visualizations, making it easier to communicate insights and share findings with stakeholders and decision-makers.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Our platform seamlessly integrates with your existing blockchain infrastructure and tooling, ensuring a smooth and efficient workflow for analyzing and leveraging blockchain data.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is this blockchain analysis app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app provides real-time monitoring and analysis of new blockchain data across multiple networks. It ingests and processes transaction data, smart contract events, and other on-chain activity to give you insights into emerging trends and patterns.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We currently support Ethereum, Bitcoin, and several major EVM-compatible chains like Polygon, Avalanche, and BNB Chain. However, our platform is designed to be extensible to add support for new networks easily.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Analyzed data can be streamed directly to your applications via WebSockets or queried through our GraphQL API. We also offer data export to data warehouses and databases of your choice.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What kind of insights can I get?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Popular use cases include tracking new token contracts, monitoring DeFi protocol activity, analyzing NFT mints and sales, scrutinizing blockchain bridges, and detecting anomalous on-chain behaviors.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our blockchain data analysis platform
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Blockchain analytics refers to the process of extracting insights from blockchain data. Our platform allows you to analyze new transactions, smart contracts, and activity across multiple blockchains.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We currently support analysis for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and several other major blockchains. Our platform is regularly updated to include new blockchain networks.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How can I use the analytics data?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: The analytics data can be used for compliance monitoring, fraud detection, business intelligence and more. Our API and data feeds integrate seamlessly with your existing systems.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: What kind of analysis can I perform?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: You can analyze transaction flows, track asset transfers, monitor smart contract activity, identify cybersecurity threats and more using our comprehensive suite of analysis tools.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How is my data privacy protected?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We use advanced encryption and access control to ensure your data remains secure and private at all times. Only you have access to your analysis and queries.
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_CREATE_ACCOUNT_PLACEHO: Create an Account for Blockchain Analytics
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app provides instant insights into the latest blockchain data as it gets added to the network. Stay ahead of the curve with up-to-the-second analysis.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Gain deeper understanding of blockchain activity through our powerful analytics engine. Identify patterns, spot anomalies, and make data-driven decisions.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Create personalized dashboards to track the metrics that matter most to you. Visualize data your way for maximum clarity.
CTA_BODY: Analyze and monitor new blockchain data with our cutting-edge analytics platform. Gain valuable insights to drive your business forward.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Harness the Power of Decentralized Data
